bioghist.p: Van Harlingens served on the Board of Trustees of Rutgers University

scopecontent.p: This scrapbook contains photographs and other documentation related to the Van Harlingen and Whatner families of Philadelphia. Materials include many photographs, newspaper clippings, family letters, genealogical information, poems, printed materials and copies of vital records. Of special note is a series of letters in which the writer (John Van Harlingen) speculates on living conditions in the Year 2222.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
